title: Rapprochement
medium:
Medium: stainless steel fiber
Technique: plain weave, reversible, four selvedges
description: Two rectangles, each with an all-over vine-like texture in subtly varied colors of dark blue and brown. The yarns are not dyed; the color variation is caused by changes in the molecular structure of the steel through sequential heating and cooling.
name: Textile
